title: General Grant National Memorial: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News         West Point Color Guard approaches podium for General Grant's annual birthday observance. NPS PHOTO  Press Releases and Media Updates Most of the time, General Grant National Memorial is a place of reflection and is as quiet as, well, a tomb. When newsworthy events occur at this National Park Service site, such as the annual observance of the two-term President's birthday, you can find out about them here. General Grant National Memorial is one of several parks within the National Parks of New York Harbor. To find out about more newsworthy events, visit our newsroom.
